products.name: Premium Brake Disc Set
products.description: High-performance ventilated brake discs for superior stopping power. Made from premium cast iron with advanced cooling vanes.

products.name: Ceramic Brake Pads Premium
products.description: Advanced ceramic brake pads with excellent heat dissipation and reduced brake dust. Perfect for daily driving.

products.name: Complete Brake Caliper Kit
products.description: Complete caliper assembly with mounting hardware, seals, and brake fluid. Ready for installation.

products.name: DOT 4 Brake Fluid 1L
products.description: High-quality DOT 4 brake fluid suitable for all vehicle types. Meets international safety standards.

products.name: Brake Rotor Performance Set
products.description: Slotted and drilled brake rotors for enhanced performance and heat dissipation. Track-tested quality.

products.name: Brake Hose Stainless Steel
products.description: Stainless steel braided brake hoses for improved pedal feel and durability. Corrosion resistant.

products.name: Brake Master Cylinder
products.description: High-quality brake master cylinder with reservoir. Precision engineered for reliable braking performance.

products.name: Brake Shoe Set Rear
products.description: Complete rear brake shoe set with springs and hardware. Suitable for drum brake systems.

products.name: Brake Repair Kit Complete
products.description: Complete brake system repair kit including seals, gaskets, and small hardware components.

products.name: Brake Tool Set Professional
products.description: Professional brake service tool set including caliper tools, bleeding kit, and measuring tools.
